about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Find your calming center the moment you drop into this magical immersion. You begin next to a mesmerizing pond accented by a creative botanical goddess. Next this immersion takes you to a small reflection pond slowly moving around you. Finish your journey enjoying a magnificent sunset atop a granite mountain.

Purpose
Relaxation
Mindfulness
Self Meditation

Length
10:25

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
